snippet: The secretary of state has rolled up more tangible accomplishments in less than a year than his celebrated predecessor, Hillary Rodham Clinton, did in four.

byline.original: By ALBERT R. HUNT | BLOOMBERG VIEW

lead_paragraph: The secretary of state has rolled up more tangible accomplishments in less than a year than his celebrated predecessor, Hillary Rodham Clinton, did in four.

headline.main: So Far, So Good for John Kerry
headline.print_headline: So Far, So Good for John Kerry
